personal.name: Vishal Giri
personal.title: Full-stack MERN Developer
personal.description: A Full-stack MERN Developer specializing in building exceptional digital experiences.

description: I specialize in full-stack web development using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js). With a passion for creating efficient and scalable applications, I bring ideas to life through clean code and intuitive user interfaces.
My expertise includes building RESTful APIs, managing databases, implementing authentication systems, and creating responsive front-end designs.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform with user authentication, product management, and payment integration.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: Real-time task management application with collaborative features and drag-and-drop functionality.

projects.title: Blog Platform
projects.description: Feature-rich blogging platform with markdown support and user interactions.

projects.title: Social Media Dashboard
projects.description: Analytics dashboard for social media metrics with real-time data visualization.
